summary: TDY stands for Temporary Duty. The documents indicate TDY is used in the context of travel assignments. One document mentions a briefing for MXWINDFALL/1 for a TDY trip to Russia, involving attendance at a nuclear physics conference and a JFK assassination conference. Another document requests security certification for Charlotte Z. Bustos-Videla for a PCS (Permanent Change of Station) or TDY assignment to Fort of Spain. The third document discusses Miguel Angel DIAZ Isalgué, a paroled Cuban scheduled for TDY travel to Argentina under an alias.
significance: TDY itself does not have a direct significance to the JFK assassination. However, one document mentions a TDY trip to Russia that includes attendance at a JFK assassination conference, suggesting that the topic of the JFK assassination was being discussed and investigated in some capacity.
